page.title: 09Where to eat
page.content: {The Swan Hotel} (Trusthouse Forte) 48 bedrooms;restaurant seating 80. Special features:2 rooms with 4 poster beds;20 prestige rooms in 14th century building. {The Angel Hotel}:8 bedrooms;restaurant with 6 tables.Special feature:hand- carved ceiling in the solar room. {The Great House Restaurant}:8 tables. Speciality:summer buffet patio lunch. {The Timbers Restaurant}:11 tables. Speciality:home cooked pies and gateaux. {The Vestry Tea Room}:8 tables. Speciality :strawberry teas. {The Old Tea Shop}.Seating for 42;coach room for 60.Special feature:450 year old cottage with thatched roof. {Bank House Tea Shop}:7 tables. Speciality:cream teas.
